body_html: @eyaler are you suggesting that packaging tensorflow may be effected by the relative paths? I can open a separate issue if my example wasn't a good fit here, but I think the pyinstaller challenge is larger than a PATH issue. Still trying to debug today, I will report back if adding to PYTHONPATH makes a difference in distributing as .exe
